comments: ( a(0) + a(1)*6 + a(2)*6^2 + ... )^k = a(0) + a(1)*6 + a(2)*6^2 + ... for each k. Apart from 0 and 1 in base 6 there are only 2 numbers with this property. For the other see A054869.
references: V. deGuerre and R. A. Fairbairn, Automorphic numbers, J. Rec. Math., 1 (No. 3, 1968), 173-179.
crossrefs: The six examples given by deGuerre and Fairbairn are A055620, A054869, A018247, A018248, A259468, A259469.
author: Paolo Dominici (pl.dm(AT)libero.it), Jun 04 2000
